mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE cte( id, parent, name, sort, reg_date ) AS ( SELECT id, parent, name, sort, reg_date FROM category WHERE parent = #{parent} UNION ALL SELECT c.id, c.parent, c.name, c.sort, c.reg_date FROM cte INNER JOIN category AS c ON cte.id = c.parent ) SELECT id, name, parent, sort, reg_date as regDate FROM cte order by parent ,sort;
